Article Title: Olympic legend Surya Bonaly loses all her medals to Las Vegas thieves while caring for her cancer-stricken mother
Article Text:
Olympic legend Surya Bonaly loses all her medals to Las Vegas thieves while caring for her cancer-stricken mother (Image Via Getty)

‚ÄúYou see all those medals I won in the past, they are sadly gone,‚Äù

Surya Bonaly shares her pain and hopes for recovery



‚ÄúI think it‚Äôs definitely organized by a company or some bad people,‚Äù

‚ÄúEuropean champion or world champion, junior, everything, any medals that I had with my skating,‚Äù

‚ÄúI feel mad. I feel like sometimes I want to cry. Some people just feel like it‚Äôs better to steal something from someone than to go to work.‚Äù

‚ÄúI just hope I can find maybe some medals,‚Äù

‚ÄúI really pray that no one‚Äôs gonna melt them.‚Äù

Former Olympic figure skater Surya Bonaly is devastated after thieves stole every medal she earned during her career. The 51-year-old, who is battling breast cancer, said the robbery happened while she was in Minnesota caring for her sick mother, who is also fighting lung, breast, and sternum cancer. The burglary took place earlier this month at her Las Vegas home near Durango and Oakey, as confirmed by FOX 5 Vegas on November 11, 2025.When Surya Bonaly returned home, she found her house in chaos. Windows were broken, Wi-Fi wires were cut, and her security cameras were destroyed. Every medal she earned across her 11-year skating career was gone.she wrote on Instagram.According to FOX 5 Vegas, the burglary was not a single break-in. Surveillance footage showed several people entering her property over multiple days.One man wore a black hoodie and another person appeared in a delivery vest. Bonaly later found a similar vest thrown on a nearby street.she told reporters.Surya Bonaly was in Minnesota helping her mother during her Cancer treatment when it happened.Three days later, she came home to find everything turned upside down.she said, describing what was stolen.Surya Bonaly‚Äôs medals included five European golds from 1991 to 1995 and three World silver medals from 1993 to 1995.Also Read: Islam Makhachev‚Äôs Emotional Words About Khabib Nurmagomedov Prove How Strong Their Brother-Like Bond Truly Runs She also competed in three Winter Olympics, famously performing a backflip at the 1998 Nagano Games, becoming the first woman ever to land it on one blade a move later banned.The Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department is investigating the case. Surya Bonaly has urged locals and pawn shops to report if they spot any foreign medals.she said.
Article Summary: Olympic legend surya bonaly loses all her medals to las vegas thieves. The 51-year-old, who is battling breast cancer, said the robbery happened while she was in minnesota caring for her sick mother. The burglary took place earlier this month at her las vegas home near durango and oakey.

Article Title: Madison Beer‚Äôs mom steals unexpected spotlight at Chargers game as all eyes shift from Justin Herbert‚Äôs girlfriend
Article Text:
Forget Justin Herbert‚Äôs famous girlfriend--Madison Beer‚Äôs mom Tracie becomes surprise star in viral Chargers moment (Getty Images)

Madison Beer understandably gets most of the attention



More

NFL

coverage

Madison Beer may draw most of the spotlight as Justin Herbert 's girlfriend, and it makes sense. Her rising music career, her fashion profile and her massive fanbase always place her at the center of attention. Yet the scene at the Chargers' recent Sunday Night Football win over the Pittsburgh Steelers shifted the focus in a surprising way. The singer arrived with her mom, Tracie, and that moment created its own buzz. It was Tracie‚Äôs first football game, and her presence added a warm and unexpected layer to the night.The timing for their outing could not have been better. Beer is celebrating the excitement around her new single "Bittersweet" and gearing up for the release of her album "Locket" in January 2026. Herbert, meanwhile, continues his strong run as a 27-year-old Pro Bowler with a five-year, $262.5 million extension, including $218.7 million guaranteed. While the star quarterback carries pressure on the field, the support system around him and Madison seems steady.Beer has been a dedicated presence at Chargers games and their team Halloween events. Her matchy sailor costume with Herbert became one of the cute highlights of the season.But this time, her mom unintentionally stole the scene with a charming Instagram Reels selfie. Viewers quickly noticed how much she looks like Madison. Tracie already has 126k followers and describes herself with the line, "Proud Mom of @madisonbeer & @ryderbeer. .. Inventor of the @halterhanger... Dog lover, who loves fashion, skincare & makeup! üíù"She wore a full Chargers outfit and later panned the camera toward Madison, who did a playful shimmy next to her. Their close bond shows up often. When Madison announced her album, her mom posted, "üòçüòçamazing üòçüòç so proud of you üòçüòç." Tracie also attended the Victoria‚Äôs Secret Fashion Show, where Madison owned the pink carpet with her all-black look and performance. Tracie even shared her own outfit from the night.Her quiet support continues behind the scenes too. At the Blue Jacket Los Angeles fashion show, she avoided talking about Madison's relationship, making a lips-zipped gesture. But she did tell TMZ that Madison "is happy." That happiness seemed clear during their cheerful night at SoFi Stadium, months after dating rumors began when Herbert appeared at one of her music video shoots in Los Angeles.
Article Summary: Madison beer's mom, tracie, was at the chargers' sunday night football win. The singer arrived with her mom, and that moment created its own buzz. Beer is celebrating the excitement around her new single "bittersweet" and gearing up for her album "locket"

Article Title: Bihar Kargahar Election Results 2025 Live: Congress looks to retain narrow edge as Ritesh Pandey adds star power to triangular fight
Article Text:
Kargahar election results

Bihar Alliance View i

Party View Seats: 243 L + W Majority: 122 NDA 0 MGB 0 OTH 0 Experience Bihar Election Results in 3D A new interactive way to explore constituencies Source: PValue

Candidates Party Votes polled Vote percentage Santosh Kumar Mishra INC



Bashisth Singh JD(U)



Uday Pratap Singh BSP



Ritesh Ranjan Pandey JS



Mahendra Prasad Gupta CPI





NEW DELHI: As counting begins, all eyes are on Kargahar Assembly constituency in Rohtas district, where the Congress is defending a slender victory margin amid a four-way contest this time.Sitting MLA Santosh Kumar Mishra (INC) is seeking to retain the seat he won in 2020, facing a renewed challenge from JD(U)‚Äôs Bashisth Singh and Jan Suraaj‚Äôs Ritesh Ranjan Pandey, the Bhojpuri singer-actor making his political debut. It also sees a friendly fight between MGB partners INC and CPI, with left candidate Mahendra Prasad Gupta also in the fray.The entry of Pandey has turned the contest into one of the most closely watched battles in southwest Bihar, bringing a mix of traditional party loyalties and celebrity appeal.In 2020, Santosh Kumar Mishra of the Indian National Congress secured victory with 59,763 votes (30.76 per cent) defeating Bashisth Singh of the Janata Dal (United) who secured 55,680 votes (28.66 per cent) - a margin of 4,083 votes. Historically, the JD(U) had held the seat since its creation post-2008 delimitation: Ram Dhani Singh (JD(U)) won in 2010 and Bashisth Singh (JD(U)) in 2015 before the Congress breakthrough in 2020.With roughly 20.4 per cent of the electorate from Scheduled Castes and around 6.4 per cent Muslim voters, the constituency remains entirely rural, and caste equations are considered critical. Political analysts are watching Kargahar closely this year because of the slim winning margin in 2020 and an emerging triangular contest in 2025. The result will indicate whether Congress can consolidate its hold or if JD(U) and its allies can reclaim the seat.The vote share of other major candidates in 2020 included Uday Pratap Singh (BSP) with 47,321 votes (24.35 per cent) and others trailing behind. As counting starts this morning, Kargahar‚Äôs outcome will be among the early indicators of how party-waves and local dynamics are shaping up ahead of broader results across Bihar.
Article Summary: Sitting mla santosh kumar mishra (inc) is seeking to retain the seat he won in 2020. He is facing a renewed challenge from jd(u)‚Äôs bashisth singh and jan suraaj's ritesh ranjan pandey. It also sees a friendly fight between mgb partners inc and cpi, with mahendra prasad gupta also in the fray.

Article Title: Matthew and Brady Tkachuk announce ‚ÄòWingmen‚Äô podcast; NHL‚Äôs brother duo joins player-led podcast trend like Kelce brothers‚Äô ‚ÄúNew Heights‚Äù
Article Text:
Matthew and Brady Tkachuk officially announce ‚ÄòWingmen‚Äô podcast (Image via: Getty Images)

Tkachuk Brothers to bring NHL players‚Äô stories to forefront with ‚ÄòWingmen‚Äô podcast



The Pat McAfee Show Live | Wednesday November 12th 2025

More coverage on NHL:

Hockey fans are about to experience a fresh, personality-driven podcast as Matthew and Brady Tkachuk officially announce Wingmen. Set to release weekly in partnership with Wave Sports & Entertainment, the show promises candid conversations, off-ice stories, and a behind-the-scenes look at life as two of the NHL‚Äôs most entertaining players. The format brings a new layer of accessibility to the sport, similar to how Travis and Jason Kelce‚Äôs New Heights energized football media.Both Tkachuk brothers have built reputations as standout personalities on and off the ice. Matthew, Florida Panthers left winger and two-time Stanley Cup winner, combines elite skill with a competitive edge that makes him impossible to ignore. Brady, Ottawa Senators‚Äô captain, contributes leadership, humor, and a bold perspective, creating a dynamic partnership ideal for a podcast setting.Hockey has long lacked a platform for players to express themselves outside of the rink. Wingmen enters this space, joining the growing player-led podcast trend and offering fans direct access to the personalities behind the helmets. The Tkachuk brothers officially introduced the show on Wednesday, with the first episode set to drop on Thursday.‚ÄúSo, for us it‚Äôs super exciting,‚Äù Matthew said on The Pat McAfee Show.‚ÄúWe FaceTime pretty much daily, weekly, or whatever. Now we‚Äôre getting paid to do it once a week, are you kidding me? So it‚Äôs pretty exciting and I‚Äôm just super excited to grow the game.‚Äù After Matthew lifted the Stanley Cup with the Panthers and the season concluded, the podcast idea resurfaced and gained momentum over the summer. ‚ÄúIt just kind of happened really quickly,‚Äù Matthew added. ‚ÄúAnd finally is actually happening.‚ÄùThe Kelce brothers‚Äô New Heights illustrated how sports podcasts could transcend the game itself, and Wingmen is positioned to do the same for the NHL by providing a mix of humor, insight, and authentic storytelling. Guest potential for the podcast is significant, ranging from NHL stars like Connor McDavid and Sidney Crosby to personalities such as Paul Bissonnette, or even their father, Keith Tkachuk. The show could bridge the gap between casual hockey observers and diehard fans, making the sport more approachable while providing a platform for honest, entertaining dialogue.With its blend of authenticity, humor, and insider access, Wingmen is poised to become a standout player-led podcast in the NHL. The Tkachuk brothers‚Äô new venture represents an exciting evolution in hockey media, combining personality, storytelling, and a fresh perspective that has been missing from the sport for years.
Article Summary: Matthew and brady tkachuk officially announce ‚Äòwingmen‚Äô podcast. Set to release weekly in partnership with wave sports & entertainment. Show promises candid conversations, off-ice stories, and a behind-the-scenes look at life as two of the nhl‚Äôs most entertaining players.

Article Title: Throwback: Did Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal really get invited to ex-wife Shaunie Henderson‚Äôs second wedding?
Article Text:
Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal and Shaunie Henderson. Image via: Jamie Schwaberow/NBAE via Getty Images | Michael Tullberg/ Getty Images

Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal receives courtesy invite to Shaunie Henderson‚Äôs wedding



Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal and Shaunie Henderson. Image via: Cassy Athena/Getty Images

Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal supports Shaunie Henderson despite memoir revelations



Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal made headlines for his connection to ex-wife Shaunie Henderson‚Äôs second wedding. Close to six months after Shaunie tied the knot with Pastor Keion Henderson in 2022, fans were curious whether the NBA legend was part of the guest list. While Shaq received an invite, sources confirm he never intended to attend. The gesture, however, highlights the respectful co-parenting and amicable relationship the former couple has maintained over the years.Shaunie and Shaq‚Äôs relationship history is well documented. Married in 2002, they divorced in 2011 after nine years together. The former couple share four children, Myles, Shareef, Amirah, and Shaqir, while Shaq also has a daughter from a previous relationship, and Shaunie has a son. Their ability to maintain communication and mutual respect has been widely noted.Shaunie Henderson opened up to E! News about the invite, recalling a playful exchange with her ex-husband. ‚ÄúMy daughter had her sweet 16,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs like, ‚ÄòWell, am I invited to the wedding?‚Äô And I was like, ‚ÄòOf course you are.‚Äô And I‚Äôm rolling my eyes like, ‚ÄòI mean you are, but do you really have to come?‚Äô‚Äù Shaunie added with a laugh, ‚ÄúI got put on the spot.What was I supposed to do?‚Äù While Shaq wasn‚Äôt attending, the invite was a gesture of courtesy, reflecting the duo‚Äôs long-standing effort to co-parent harmoniously and remain friendly for their children.Shaunie‚Äôs husband, Pastor Keion Henderson, has yet to meet Shaq in person. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs not an intentional thing,‚Äù he explained. ‚ÄúOur paths have led towards each other, but they haven‚Äôt crossed. I‚Äôm sure they will‚Ä¶ We have nothing to compete about. I‚Äôm looking forward to meeting him as I would anybody who‚Äôs accomplished in life what they have like he has.‚ÄùShaq further demonstrated his respect and understanding when Shaunie released her memoir, UNDEFEATED: Changing the Rules and Winning on My Own Terms. Addressing a statement about their past, he posted, ‚ÄúI understand. I wouldn‚Äôt have been in love with me either. Wishing you all the best. All love, Shaq.‚ÄùFans praised the NBA icon for supporting his ex-wife and mother of his children, highlighting that co-parenting can thrive on respect and maturity, even after high-profile relationships end. As of now, the NBA legend is currently single.Also Read: Ex-NBA star targets Megan Thee Stallion with brutal comments amid Klay Thompson‚Äôs on-court slump
Article Summary: Shaquille o‚Äôneal received an invite to ex-wife shaunie henderson‚Äôs second wedding. Sources confirm he never intended to attend. The gesture highlights the respectful co-parenting and amicable relationship the former couple has maintained over the years.

Article Title: ‚ÄúHe might just want his peace of mind‚Äù-Kendrick Perkins suggests Nico Harrison‚Äôs exit from Dallas Mavericks chaos was important for his mental health
Article Text:
Nico Harrison (Image via Getty)

Kendrick Perkins defends Nico Harrison‚Äôs firing from the Dallas Mavericks

Kendrick Perkins Defends Nico Harrison After Firing, Mavericks Were Never Healthy! | TMZ Sports

Nico Harrison‚Äôs exit from the Dallas Mavericks has generated waves in NBA world. From being called out for Luka Doncic‚Äôs trade with the Los Angeles Lakers to facing the wrath of Mavericks‚Äô fans- Harrison has been a hotbed of discussion for a long time. Apart from making headlines after being fired from the Mavericks, Nico Harrison has been backed by a few prominent NBA stars.Recently, former NBA star Kendrick Perkins reacted to Harrison‚Äôs exit from Dallas Mavericks. The ESPN‚Äôs sports analyst believes the sudden move by the NBA franchise is nothing less than a blessing in disguise for Harrison. According to Kendrick Perkins, Nico Harrison needed the much-needed peace of mind away from the Mavericks‚Äô chaotic front desk situation.Former Boston Celtics star Kendrick Perkins shared a very different view on Nico Harrison‚Äôs exit from the Dallas Mavericks. According to the sports analyst, Harrison needed some time off from the chaotic front desk the NBA franchise. During a recent conversation with TMZ at LAX, Perkins reflected on how Nico Harrison went through one of the worst times of his life after Luka Doncic‚Äôs exit from Mavericks. He even touched on the Harrisons‚Äô current state and said,"In fairness to Nico, he lost his job -- he didn't get a chance to see that team on the floor fully healthy. We still haven't seen Kyrie Irving and AD touch the floor together in a Dallas Maverick uniform, which is unfortunate, but when you trade an international superstar, your room for error is very, very small.And that's what ended up happening."Kendrick Perkins even mentioned that maybe Nico would not be interested in being a part of any NBA franchise post his exit from the Mavericks. The NBA icon emphasized Nico Harrison losing his job during the ongoing NBA season. Reportedly, the entire situation at the Dallas Mavericks front office escalated after Luka Doncic was traded to the Los Angeles Lakers. Mavericks fans went ballistic on Harrison and even demanded his eviction from the NBA franchise.Also Read: Kendrick Perkins criticizes Kevin Durant over comments on James Harden‚Äôs exit from the Oklahoma City Thunder in Netflix‚Äôs "The Starting Five"
Article Summary: Kendrick perkins defends nico harrison‚Äôs firing from the dallas mavericks. According to the sports analyst, harrison needed some time off from the chaotic front desk the nba franchise. Perkins even mentioned that maybe nico would not be interested in being a part of any nba franchise post his exit from the mavericks.

Article Title: Vaibhav Suryavanshi's two-word response to 'age trolls' goes viral; teammates burst out laughing - watch
Article Text:
Vaibhav Suryavanshi's teammates playfully trolled him, raising questions about his age as India A head to the Emerging Teams Asia Cup (Images via X/Screengrabs)

Ryan Ten Doeschate press conference: On India Playing XI, Dhruv Jurel, workload management and more

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll Is Vaibhav Suryavanshi ready for the senior national team? Yes, he is definitely ready! Not quite yet, needs more experience.

India A cricketer and teenage sensation Vaibhav Suryavanshi, who has made headlines for being one of the youngest prodigies in Indian cricket, was at the centre of light-hearted banter from his teammates ahead of the ACC T20 Emerging Teams Asia Cup in Doha.A video featuring Suryavanshi along with teammates Yudhvir Singh Charak and Gurjapneet Singh has gone viral on social media. In the clip, originally shared via Gurjapneet‚Äôs Snapchat account, the 28-year-old Yudhvir can be seen jokingly asking who between him and the teenager looks older. When Yudhvir points at Suryavanshi, the 14-year-old simply replies, ‚ÄúNo comments.‚ÄùThe two senior players, both nearly double his age, continued to tease him about his hairstyle and accused him of using hair gel.Suryavanshi laughed it off and denied it, even swearing that he didn‚Äôt. The video has since gone viral, with the moment surfacing on social media as the team traveled to Doha.Suryavanshi, who holds the record for the second-fastest century in the Indian Premier League, has attracted a lot of attention for his age ever since Rajasthan Royals signed him at 13 ahead of IPL 2025. Questions surrounding his age remained prominent, given how he competed with such ease at the highest level.BCCI officials have previously stated that Suryavanshi is ‚Äúknocking on the doors‚Äù of the senior national team, and his selection for India ‚ÄòA‚Äô over the Under-19 squad shows the board‚Äôs confidence in his talent.The India A squad has now arrived in Doha, as seen in photos and videos shared by players on social media. Gurjapneet‚Äôs latest posts also show the team training at the Asian Town Cricket Stadium ahead of the tournament opener on Friday, November 13.India A will begin their campaign against UAE before facing Pakistan A on Sunday and Oman on November 18 in the group stage of the Emerging Teams Asia Cup 2025.
Article Summary: India a cricketer vaibhav suryavanshi was at the centre of light-hearted banter from his teammates ahead of the acc t20 emerging teams asia cup in doha. The video has since gone viral, with the moment surfacing on social media as the team traveled to doha for the tournament.

Article Title: Bahrain makes history: Meet Captain Fatima Nabeel, the first Bahraini woman to pilot world's largest commercial jet
Article Text:
Bahraini A380 trailblazer, Captain Fatima soars into history/Image: Gulf Daily News (GDN Online)

Bahraini woman reaches Captain status

Who is Captain Fatima Nabeel Al Qaood?

Why does the A380 matter?

Bahraini women in aviation

Inspiration for the next generation





For the Kingdom of Bahrain, the year marks a soaring new chapter in its history books. Captain Fatima Nabeel Al Qaood has landed an unprecedented achievement, becoming the nation's first female Captain to command the majestic Airbus A380. Taking the controls of the world's largest passenger aircraft, Captain Al Qaood has not only validated her own mastery of complex flight technology but has also symbolically lifted her entire country onto a global stage, demonstrating Bahrain's commitment to nurturing pioneering female leadership in one of the most demanding professions on Earth.The skies have a new commander, and she hails from the Kingdom of Bahrain. Captain Fatima Nabeel Al Qaood has officially achieved the ultimate dream of commercial pilots: the prestigious rank of Captain. What makes this an extraordinary milestone is the aircraft she commands‚Äîthe colossal Airbus A380. Captain Al Qaood is the first woman from Bahrain to reach this elite status while piloting the world‚Äôs largest commercial passenger jet.This achievement follows a rigorous and demanding journey.Reaching Captain status requires accumulating thousands of flight hours, passing complex technical examinations, and demonstrating flawless command ability‚Äîskills proven by Captain Al Qaood on one of the most sophisticated machines ever built.Captain Fatima Nabeel Al Qaood's historic ascent to the command seat of the Airbus A380 is a defining moment for Bahrain and the Arab world, marking a major triumph for women in professional aviation. As a proud Bahraini national, her achievement is uniquely significant because she is the first woman from the Kingdom to achieve the rank of Captain while piloting the colossal A380, the world's largest commercial aircraft. While other pioneering women, such as Captain Yasmeen Fraidoon, previously broke the barrier by becoming Bahrain's first female Captains on smaller fleet aircraft, Captain Al Qaood has taken that legacy to the ultimate level of complexity and scale.Her success is the culmination of years of rigorous, demanding technical training and thousands of hours flying in the sky, positioning her not merely as a remarkably skilled pilot, but as a global inspiring symbol of the ambitious, highly-trained female workforce that is steadily shattering traditional barriers throughout the modern Gulf region.To truly grasp the scale of Captain Al Qaood‚Äôs achievement, one must understand the significance of the Airbus A380, often nicknamed the "Superjumbo." It represents the pinnacle of commercial aviation engineering, and commanding it is a globally recognized feat of skill.The A380 is a double-decker giant that demands exceptional expertise:Unmatched Scale: It is the largest passenger plane in operation, weighing nearly 600 tonnes at takeoff and carrying over 500 passengers.Technical Mastery: Its complex systems require a Captain who possesses not only piloting skills but also superior crew resource management and emergency procedure expertise.The Elite Few: The number of pilots, particularly women, qualified to command this massive aircraft is incredibly small, placing Captain Al Qaood in an elite global cohort of aviators.Her position is a powerful testament to her technical precision and ability to lead a crew responsible for hundreds of lives.Captain Fatima Nabeel Al Qaood‚Äôs achievement is the latest in a line of groundbreaking firsts for Bahraini women in the air, showing a consistent national commitment to female empowerment in the aviation sector.First Captains: Captain Al Qaood follows in the footsteps of pioneers like Captain Yasmeen Fraidoon, who became Gulf Air's first female Bahraini Captain on the national carrier's fleet (Airbus A320s/A330s). Captain Al Qaood's achievement extends this legacy to the A380.Military Milestones: In 2018, Sheikha Aisha bint Rashid Al Khalifa made history as the Kingdom's first female fighter pilot, flying a BAE Hawk.Engineering Excellence: Pioneering women like Hend Al Awadhi were the first female aircraft engineers, ensuring the safety of the fleet from the ground up.Captain Al Qaood‚Äôs command of the A380 is a symbol that the glass ceiling for women in the Gulf is not just cracked‚Äîit‚Äôs been completely shattered at the cruising altitude of 43,000 feet.Captain Al Qaood‚Äôs success is a direct, visible call to action for young women across the Middle East. Her journey is proof that dedication, passion, and rigorous training open doors to the most challenging and rewarding careers, regardless of background.By taking the ultimate seat on the ultimate jet, she has provided a powerful narrative: the complex technical fields of science and aviation are fully accessible. Her legacy, flying the world‚Äôs largest commercial aircraft, serves as a beacon of possibility, ensuring that the future of aviation is increasingly diverse and female-led.
Article Summary: Captain fatima nabeel al qaood is the first woman from bahrain to reach this elite status while piloting the world‚Äôs largest commercial passenger jet. She follows in the footsteps of pioneers like captain yasmeen fraidoon who became gulf air's first female captain on the national carrier's fleet.

Article Title: Will Breece Hall play against the New England Patriots tonight? Latest injury update on the popular New York Jets running back
Article Text:
All eyes are on Breece Hall.(Image via Getty Images)

Is the New York Jets‚Äô star player, Breece Hall, taking the field against the New England Patriots tonight?



More coverage on the NFL -



The New York Jets are experiencing a challenging time on the field as the team has lost seven out of the nine matches played so far in the new season. The team has lost against the Pittsburgh Steelers, the Buffalo Bills, the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, the Miami Dolphins, the Dallas Cowboys, the Denver Broncos and the Carolina Panthers.The New York Jets have managed to win two matches played so far, against the Cincinnati Browns and the Cleveland Browns. As the team gears up to face the New England Patriots tonight, all eyes are on their star player, Breece Hall.Yes, the New York Jets‚Äô running back, Breece Hall, is all set to face the New England Patriots tonight at Gillette Stadium.At this point in time, Breece Hall does not feature in the New York Jets‚Äô injury report.As per the injury report, it seems the team has ruled out wide receiver Garrett Wilson and cornerback Azareye‚Äôh Thomas from tonight‚Äôs game.The injury report has also listed Braiden McGregor, Khalil Herbert, Xavier Newman-Johnson, Harrison Phillips and Will McDonald as questionable for tonight‚Äôs game.For the last few months, there have been many trade speculations about Breece Hall even though the New York Jets have remained silent over it.Last month, Breece Hall had broken his silence over it as he said, "I‚Äôm here. I want to be here. I love being a New York Jet and everything‚Ä¶But at the end of the day, I don‚Äôt control what goes on. I only control what I do on the field and how I handle my business off the field, so for me it's all about servicing my teammates and coaches the best way I can."With the New York Jets gearing up to face the New England Patriots tonight, fans are pretty concerned about the Jets‚Äô future in the new season.The exciting match between the New England Patriots and the New York Jets is all set to begin at 8:15pm ET at the Patriots‚Äô home ground, the Gillette Stadium in Foxborough, Massachusetts.Viewers can tune into Amazon Prime Video to live stream the exciting match tonight.
Article Summary: Breece hall does not feature in the new york jets‚Äô injury report. The team has ruled out wide receiver garrett wilson and cornerback azareye‚Äôh thomas from tonight‚Äôs game. Braiden mcgregor, khalil herbert, xavier newman-johnson, harrison phillips and will mcdonald are also listed as questionable.

Article Title: Ayesha Curry drops four-word flirty message for shirtless Stephen Curry after controversial marriage remarks
Article Text:
Stephen Curry with Ayesha Curry (Image via Getty)

Ayesha Curry: Marriage, Motherhood & My Identity (Full Episode)

Stephen Curry and his wife, Ayesha Curry generated waves on the internet after their decade-long marriage came under scrutiny. Article Title: Matthew Stafford and wife Kelly turn matchmakers for FOX Sports host Charissa Thompson and boyfriend Steven Cundari
Article Text:
Matthew and Kelly Stafford helped Charissa Thompson find love (Image via: Getty Images)

How Matthew and Kelly Stafford introduced Charissa Thompson to Steven Cundari



More coverage in NFL:

Charissa Thompson, one of the most recognizable faces on FOX Sports, has been in the spotlight for her sharp hosting skills and engaging on-screen presence. Yet, this time, it‚Äôs not her sports coverage making headlines; it‚Äôs her love life. The popular sportscaster recently revealed that her romance with Los Angeles entrepreneur Steven Cundari began thanks to an unexpected assist from NFL star Matthew Stafford and his wife, Kelly.During an episode of her Calm Down podcast with co-host Erin Andrews, Thompson shared that the Staffords decided to play matchmaker after growing tired of her dating struggles. The FOX Sports personality didn‚Äôt shy away from crediting the couple for her new chapter, calling their matchmaking skills nothing short of game-changing.Thompson explained that the Rams quarterback and his wife introduced her to Steven Cundari back in 2022, and the connection instantly clicked. ‚ÄúMatthew and Kelly were sick of me dating losers,‚Äù she joked on the podcast. ‚ÄúThey were like, ‚ÄòWe have a great guy for you.‚Äô So they were the matchmakers. It was vetted. I know the social security and the bank account now, so all is right.‚ÄùSince then, Thompson has shared that meeting Cundari felt easy and natural from the start.She appreciated that their relationship began through mutual friends she deeply trusted, making it feel both genuine and grounded‚Äîsomething rare in her busy world of sports broadcasting.Cundari, a successful marketing executive, venture partner, and startup investor, has built a strong reputation in Los Angeles for his innovative business strategies and brand-building expertise. His relationship with Thompson quickly drew attention across sports and entertainment media, turning the couple into one of the most talked-about duos off the field.Even Erin Andrews, Thompson‚Äôs longtime friend and co-host, gave her stamp of approval, describing Cundari as ‚Äúfun, grounded, and a great fit.‚Äù The FOX Sports star seems happier than ever, proving that even in the fast-paced world of sports broadcasting, love can come from the most unexpected play call.Charissa Thompson‚Äôs love story stands out as a refreshing change in the world of sports media. With a little help from Matthew and Kelly Stafford, she found not just romance but a genuine connection built on trust and friendship. Even in the spotlight, love often arrives when you least expect it, and sometimes, it just takes the right pass from the right teammates.
Article Summary: Charissa thompson is one of the most recognizable faces on fox sports. The popular sportscaster recently revealed that her romance with steven cundari began thanks to an unexpected assist from nfl star matthew stafford and his wife, kelly. The staffords decided to play matchmaker after growing tired of her dating struggles.

Article Title: Tarn Taran bypoll result: Congress, SAD, AAP in high-stakes three-way fight; counting begins
Article Text:
Representative Image

Candidates Vote Win/Loss Harmeet Singh Sandhu AAP Karanbir Singh Burj Congress Sukhwinder Kaur Randhawa SAD

Harjit Singh Sandhu BJP







NEW DELHI: Polling for the Tarn Taran Assembly by-election in Punjab on Tuesday saw a voter turnout of 60.95%, slightly lower than 65.81% recorded in the 2022 assembly elections. Polling remained peaceful across 222 booths, with votes scheduled to be counted today.The by-election was necessitated following the death of AAP MLA Kashmir Singh Sohal in June.The election is being seen as a test of the ruling AAP government‚Äôs popularity in the border constituency.
Article Summary: The by-election was necessitated following the death of aap mla kashmir singh sohal in june. The election is being seen as a test of the ruling aap government‚Äôs popularity in the border constituency. Polling remained peaceful across 222 booths, with votes scheduled to be counted today.

Article Title: "I'm not a bad guy": Micheal Ray Richardson‚Äôs heartbreaking words about his addiction to drugs resurface after his tragic death
Article Text:
Michael Ray Richardson was banned from the NBA in 1986.(Image via NBA)

Micheal Ray Richardson opened up about using drugs in his memoir



Micheal Ray Richardson on overcoming a lifetime ban from the NBA (Hear District - Episode 26)

More coverage on the NBA -

Micheal Ray Richardson, the NBA legend suffered an unfortunate death which has left his fans mourning and shocked. While Micheal Ray Richardson had a short career in the NBA, fans are still in awe of his skills.Back in 1986, Micheal Ray Richardson was banned from the NBA for life after he ended up testing positive for cocaine for the third time in three seasons. While the NBA legend did get a chance to rejoin the league in 1988, he never returned.A year ago, he co-authored a memoir about his life called, "Banned: How I squandered an All-Star NBA Career Before Finding a Redemption‚Äù, where he opened up about his addiction to drugs.In his memoir, Micheal Ray Richardson had opened up about meeting a man named Muhammad who had gotten him addicted to drugs.As per his memoir, Micheal Ray Richardson wrote, ‚ÄúEven though I got into some rough spots, I'm not a bad guy. You get blinders when you're an addict. You're there, looking through your eyes... but at the same time, you're not all there. Because of that, when I would get high, I wouldn't want to go out in public.‚ÄùThe 70 year old NBA legend also reiterated that he never sold drugs or drove his car while he was ‚Äúsmoking‚Äù it.A year back, Micheal Ray Richardson also spoke to The Guardian about drugs being used in the league today.He said, ‚ÄúEven now‚Ä¶it‚Äôs not like it was back in the 80s when I was [playing]. Because now there‚Äôs the fentanyl. Now what they‚Äôre doing is mixing all the drugs with fentanyl and it only takes a little ‚Äì because fentanyl will kill you.‚ÄùThe NBA legend added, ‚ÄúOne thing about alcohol and drugs‚Ä¶they do not discriminate.‚ÄùAfter leaving the NBA in 1986 and refusing to return, Micheal Ray Richardson played in the Continental Basketball Association but finished his career in Europe.Later in his life, the NBA legend won five championships as a coach in the Continental Basketball Association and NBL Canada.According to The Associated Press, Micheal Ray Richardson died in his home in Lawton, Oklahoma in the presence of his wife, Kimberly.
Article Summary: Micheal ray richardson was banned from the nba for life in 1986 after testing positive for cocaine for the third time in three seasons. The nba legend never returned to the league and spent the rest of his career in europe. In his memoir, he opened up about meeting a man named muhammad who got him addicted to drugs.

Identify patterns or associations to sort them into four correct categories.Yes, the game provides subtle hints to guide players without revealing the answers outright.Yes, it is available for free on both mobile devices and desktop platforms.It sharpens pattern recognition, logical thinking, lateral reasoning, and problem-solving skills.

Each day, players are presented with 16 seemingly random words arranged in a 4x4 grid, and the goal is to group them into four distinct thematic categories.

Article Title: Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal details his astonishing habit that opened door to an unlikely acting partnership with Adam Sandler
Article Text:
Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal and Adam Sandler. Image via: Ethan Miller - Formula 1/Formula 1 via Getty | Tommaso Boddi/ Getty

How Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal‚Äôs stress-relief habit led to Adam Sandler‚Äôs movie roles



Anthony Anderson Had Shaq In TEARS, Talks Shohei & Luka + How He Got Roles In Adam Sandler‚Äôs Movies

Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal and Adam Sandler‚Äôs shared love of basketball deepened the bond



Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal has lived a life filled with championships, endorsements, and unforgettable NBA moments, but his leap into comedy films came from a place few expected. During the height of his career, the pressures of being a franchise cornerstone weighed on him. Games were high-stakes, his workload was massive, and the public scrutiny grew louder every season. To stay centered, O‚ÄôNeal developed a simple ritual: he turned to comedies. Adam Sandler ‚Äôs films, in particular, became his escape. Those nights spent laughing not only eased stress but unknowingly laid the groundwork for one of the most unexpected NBA-to-Hollywood pipelines.O‚ÄôNeal‚Äôs personality always extended beyond the court, but comedy gave him something different.It allowed him to detach from missed free throws, media noise, and playoff pressure. What started as a private coping mechanism evolved into a connection that would later lead him to movie sets, surrounded by the Happy Madison crew. His acting roles did not happen by accident. They were the byproduct of a long-running inside joke between him and one of Hollywood‚Äôs biggest comedians.Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal opened up about the origins of the partnership on his Big Podcast, explaining how movies were part of his recovery routine during his NBA years.‚ÄúMusic and movies kept me out of the, ‚ÄòYou missed 30 free throws etc. etc,‚Äô I would spend 20 hours worrying about that, but I needed time to recharge. So I got to laugh. Only way to recharge is laugh or hear something I like,‚Äù he said. For him, humor wasn‚Äôt just entertainment. It was maintenance.That connection grew whenever Sandler sat courtside. O‚ÄôNeal often found himself shouting playful requests after big plays. According to him, their banter eventually became a running challenge.‚ÄúAdam Sandler, he‚Äôs still hot, but he was hot at the time. I‚Äôd always say, ‚ÄòHey man, you got to put me in a movie.‚Äô And he was smart. ‚ÄòWin me a championship big fella.‚Äô He‚Äôd always say that. So then after the first championship, ‚ÄòHey man put me in a movie.‚Äô ‚ÄòWin another championship big fella.‚Äô He would always say that.‚ÄùSandler kept the promise. After O‚ÄôNeal retired, he received a call through a mutual friend that changed everything. ‚ÄúSo then after I retired, my guy Danny called me and said, ‚ÄòHey man. Adam Sandler said he would always tell you he would put you in his movies. He‚Äôs got four movies for you.‚Äô So he put me in movies back-to-back,‚Äù O‚ÄôNeal said. The result was a string of appearances in Jack & Jill, Grown Ups 2, Blended, and Hubie Halloween, all under Sandler‚Äôs Happy Madison banner.Sandler‚Äôs ties to basketball are well-known. From Uncut Gems to Hustle, the comedian has built much of his creative world around the sport. That connection made O‚ÄôNeal an ideal addition to his projects. Years earlier, O‚ÄôNeal told PopCulture.com about the original challenge: ‚ÄúCrazy thing about the Adam Sandler movies - he used to sit there with Jack Nicholson. I used to always, especially after I scored a bucket and the crowd goes crazy, I'd be like, 'Adam, give me a movie!' He would say, 'Win a championship first. ‚Äô‚ÄùWhen Sandler eventually called, he reminded O‚ÄôNeal of the deal. ‚ÄúHe called me up one day and said, ‚ÄòShaq, you got four championships, I owe you four movies.‚Äô‚ÄùO‚ÄôNeal may never anchor a dramatic Oscar contender, but he doesn‚Äôt need to. He has done his part well and lived his long-time dream.Also Read: Throwback: Did Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal really get invited to ex-wife Shaunie Henderson‚Äôs second wedding?
Article Summary: Shaquille o‚Äôneal and adam sandler‚Äôs shared love of basketball deepened the bond between the two men. O'neal often found himself shouting playful requests after big plays. Sandler would say, ‚Äòwin me a championship big fella.‚Äô the result was a string of appearances in jack & jill, grown ups 2, blended, and hubie halloween.

Article Title: Challengers fancied over champions: India at home pose the ultimate challenge for South Africa
Article Text:
Shubman Gill and Temba Bavuma (AP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Shubman Gill Press Conference: Team India captain opens up about India‚Äôs bowling plan for SA Test

KOLKATA: It is not often that a champion team starts off in a game as underdogs. When World Test champions South Africa take on India in the first Test of the two-match series at the Eden Gardens here from Friday, they will surely not be the favourites. That‚Äôs a tag reserved for India when they are playing at home, even if on a wicket that might provide more help to seamers than anywhere else in the country.‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a typical Indian wicket,‚Äù India skipper Shubman Gill said on Thursday, after checking the all-important rectangle for the millionth time over three days. ‚ÄúToday, it looked a bit different from how it was yesterday,‚Äù he added.Now, that‚Äôs interesting. These variations might just make the team combination pendulum oscillate between spin and pace. ‚ÄúIt tends to swing in the morning and evening in Kolkata,‚Äù Gill said. Statistics say pacers picked 75 per cent of wickets in the last four Tests. So, Kuldeep or Akash Deep?But then, in India, spin dominates eventually. Maybe, play safe and go for Axar Patel and thus have an extra batter. After all, South Africa too have some dangerous weapons in their bowling armoury.‚ÄúWe‚Äôll wait for another look tomorrow morning before deciding our playing XI,‚Äù Gill concluded.South Africa skipper Temba Bavuma would also wait for Friday before declaring his team. ‚ÄúHere in Kolkata, it swings a bit more than other parts of India, but then this is the subcontinent and you have to make sure that you have your resources from the spin point of view,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúSo, we‚Äôll wait one more day.‚Äù India‚Äôs dilemma is quite understandable, given the debacle against New Zealand. Dishing out turners went against them as even a not-so-established spinner like Ajaz Patel ended up looking menacing. Sometimes, the demon you bank on can turn back and devour you. If Gill, Gautam Gambhir (head coach) and Sitanshu Kotak (batting coach) were repeatedly going back to check the pitch, holding discussions with the curators, they were perhaps trying to figure out if indeed there were any hidden demons.‚ÄúNo demons out there,‚Äù South Africa coach Shukri Conrad declared after inspecting the pitch. ‚ÄúJust a normal Eden Gardens wicket.‚Äù His bowlers did get some swing towards the fag end of an afternoon practice session. That would be around 4 pm, when the light starts fading. Reverse swing would be a major factor too, as Gill admitted. The team managements will have to keep all permutations in mind before settling down on their playing XI.Thursday‚Äôs net session was a lot about batting. Rishabh Pant had a lengthy session, both against pace and spin. So did Gill and KL Rahul. The skipper took Kuldeep and Axar, along with two local spinners for another net. Gambhir soon joined, speaking to Kuldeep and Axar separately. It might well be a toss-up between these two if the combination pendulum veers towards spin.South Africa too have their batting in place, the dependable Bavuma, fluent Ryan Rickleton, elegant Tony de Zorzi and gritty Aiden Markram all spent some quality time in the nets on Thursday. This batting lineup is way stronger than that of the West Indies, India‚Äôs last Test opponents, whom they dominated over two Tests. The only worry for Gill‚Äôs team in that series was that they allowed the second Test to go to Day 5. ‚ÄúIt was a slow wicket (in Delhi) and our spinners were not getting the zip,‚Äù Gill said. In hindsight, he admitted enforcing the follow-on was unfair on the tired bowlers and might have stretched the game. Eden would be a lot faster, with zip for spinners and swing for pacers.Test matches always have battles within the war: Jasprit Bumrah vs Bavuma; Kagiso Rabada vs Gill; Mohammed Siraj vs Rickleton or maybe Keshav Maharaj vs Rahul. A lot of interesting battles could be played out there over the next five days, making it a lively contest.
Article Summary: South africa take on india in the first test of the two-match series at the eden gardens here from friday. ‚Äúit‚Äôs a typical indian wicket,‚Äù india skipper shubman gill said on thursday, after checking the all-important rectangle over three days. Test matches always have battles within the war: jasprit bumrah vs bavuma; kagiso rabada vs gill.

Article Title: ‚ÄúI consider myself a Saudi now‚Äù: Cristiano Ronaldo says his ‚ÄòCrazy‚Äô move has been proven right
Article Text: Cristiano Ronaldo, initially called 'crazy' for his Saudi move, now feels like a Saudi, praising the kingdom's safety and tourism. He believes his decision was right and hopes to be an ambassador for the 2034 World Cup, which he predicts will be the best ever. His presence has significantly boosted the Saudi Pro League.
Article Summary: Cristiano ronaldo was initially called 'crazy' for his move to saudi arabia. But he now feels like a saudi, praising the kingdom's safety and tourism. He hopes to be an ambassador for the 2034 world cup, which he predicts will be the best ever.

Article Title: Kuldeep Yadav requests leave for his wedding
Article Text:
India's head coach Gautam Gambhir (left) with Kuldeep Yadav during a training session. (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Shubman Gill Press Conference: Team India captain opens up about India‚Äôs bowling plan for SA Test

NEW DELHI: Kuldeep Yadav has requested the Indian cricket board ( BCCI ) to grant him leave for his wedding later this month. TOI understands he is waiting for approval from the board. He was forced to cancel his wedding function earlier in the year when the IPL finished later than the scheduled date due to cross-border tension between India and Pakistan.BCCI sources told TOI that Kuldeep has sought leave in the last week of Nov. There has been a debate over Kuldeep‚Äôs place in the playing XI with leftarm spinner Axar Patel fighting for the third spinner‚Äôs role in the two-Test series against South Africa starting in Kolkata on Friday.The second Test will be played in Guwahati from Nov 22. The first ODI against South Africa is in Ranchi on Nov 30.‚ÄúKuldeep‚Äôs wedding is planned for the last week of Nov. The team management will assess when they will need his services before granting him the exact number of leaves,‚Äù a BCCI source said.It will be interesting to see if Kuldeep finds a place in the XI if the pitches offer prodigious turn early in the match. He was dropped for the entire home Test season last year when India played on rank turners. He also didn‚Äôt get a Test in England this year. The team management had released him from the ODI squad in Australia to prepare for the South Africa Tests by playing for India ‚ÄòA‚Äô against South Africa ‚ÄòA‚Äô in Bengaluru last week. He managed just one wicket in that match. His inferior batting capabilities have come in the way of his selection as well.
Article Summary: Kuldeep yadav has requested the indian cricket board ( bcci ) to grant him leave for his wedding later this month. Toi understands he is waiting for approval from the board. There has been a debate over kuldeep‚Äôs place in the playing xi.

Article Title: South Africa's Temba Bavuma revels in new-found respect
Article Text:
South Africa chief coach Shukri Conrad, left, talks with captain Temba Bavuma. (AP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Shubman Gill Press Conference: Team India captain opens up about India‚Äôs bowling plan for SA Test

KOLKATA: When you become a world champion, you are most likely to celebrate in the manner that Indian women‚Äôs captain Harmanpreet Kaur did after beating South Africa women to win the World Cup: With a couple of bhangra steps, slapping a handshake and then accepting the trophy. Not like Temba Bavuma . The South Africa captain remained ice cool in the centre of frenzied celebrations after they became the Test world champions, beating Australia at Lord‚Äôs in what was surely one of the biggest upsets of the decade. The enormity of the occasion took time to sink in.A few months down the line, that winning feeling has sunk in and most of South Africa‚Äôs cricketers have already moved on. ‚ÄúYeah, I think it has sunk in. I think whenever we go into series, there‚Äôs a lot more of an expectation from us as a team to, I guess, uphold the whole champion status,‚Äù Bavuma said on Thursday. ‚ÄúIt doesn‚Äôt really change anything from our point of view, but I think from a confidence point, it‚Äôs just a case of us kind of walking proudly.‚ÄúWe‚Äôre known as the champions, the current champions at this point. We have a lovely opportunity now coming up against India in their own conditions. Not many bigger challenges than that. So it is an opportunity for us to kind of stamp ourselves with that label.‚ÄùThe champions label doesn‚Äôt come cheap and Bavuma knows that their performance will be keenly followed from now on. Already, the drawn series against Pakistan has generated a lot of interest, particularly how their spinners performed.Back home, however, the celebrations continue even as Bavuma‚Äôs team is focusing on their job in the ongoing WTC cycle.‚ÄúBack home, I do feel like there‚Äôs been a major shift in mindset towards cricket. There‚Äôs been a lot more appreciation. The love that‚Äôs been shown towards the team, also to individuals within the team... I think for myself personally, probably a lot more appreciation for my presence within the team. So I guess that‚Äôs something that‚Äôs been good.‚ÄùChokers to champions has been the South African story, although Bavuma doesn‚Äôt quite agree with that narrative. ‚ÄúI really don‚Äôt think that it was (chokers‚Äô tag) something for this group of guys. Some of these guys weren‚Äôt even born when World Cups happened and where we didn‚Äôt get over the line. So it really is not for this team to kind of walk around with. I think for some of us, some older guys have been at ICC events and have come up short. You know, it probably brought a little bit of relief, but also stronger belief that if you keep going, if you keep pushing, things are about to happen. So, yeah, I think confidence is probably the biggest word back home. For us as a team, it‚Äôs about being confident that we can continue being the No.1 team.‚Äù
Article Summary: Temba bavuma says south africa's world cup win has'sunk in' south africa face india in their first test at the ageas bowl. Bavuma's side beat australia at lord's in one of the biggest upsets of the decade.

Article Title: Shattering records and cultivating future stars
Article Text:
Mayura Shanbaug

Ashish Kumar Srivastava - MD and CEO of PNB MetLife

Sameer Bansal - Chief Distribution Officer of PNB MetLife

Chirag Shetty - Asian Games Gold Medalist & JBC 2023 mentor

Satwiksairaj Rankireddy - Asian Games Gold Medalist & JBC 2023 mentor

Disclaimer: Content Produced by PNB Metlife

The 7th PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship shattered records with over 8,200 young talent nationwide, earning global recognition and fostering a culture of resilience and determination in aspiring badminton starsIn a spectacular display of badminton prowess and youthful enthusiasm, the 7th edition of the PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship (JBC) etched its name in the annals of sporting history. Celebrating a staggering participation of 8257 young champions from across India, the championship not only broke its own record set in 2022 but also clinched the title of the ‚ÄòMost kids participating in a Badminton Championship in multiple cities‚Äô as recognised by the World Record Certification Agency (WRCA).The grand finale unfolded at the Indira Gandhi Indoor Stadium in New Delhi, where the air was thick with competition, camaraderie, and the unmistakable passion for badminton. The event, graced by chief guests Chirag Shetty and Satwik Rankireddy, Asian Games Gold Medalists and JBC 2023 mentors, was a true celebration of the sport‚Äôs rising stars.The 10-city extravaganza, spanning the length and breadth of the country, showcased the unwavering commitment of PNB MetLife in nurturing young talents in the badminton arena. With participants exceeding 8200, it‚Äôs evident that the PNB MetLife JBC has become a beacon for aspiring shuttlers, highlighting the deep-seated passion for badminton among the diverse and talented youth of India.Beyond the glitz and glamour of the record-breaking numbers, the championship holds a special place in the hearts of those at the helm. Ashish Kumar Srivastava, MD and CEO of PNB MetLife, expressed pride in not just surpassing their own world record but also in contributing to India‚Äôs glory on the international badminton stage. The championship, he emphasized, is not merely a competition but a significant milestone in creating a pan-India badminton ecosystem.This edition of the JBC saw a strategic partnership with world champions Chirag Shetty and Satwiksairaj Rankireddy, who served as mentors for the young talents. Sameer Bansal, Chief Distribution Officer of PNB MetLife, acknowledged the pivotal role played by these champions in inspiring the next generation of badminton stars. The focus, according to Bansal, is on unleashing the latent potential of young shuttlers and preparing them for global excellence.The Delhi chapter of the championship witnessed some nail-biting action with over 1000 participants competing fiercely across various categories. From Ananya Talyan‚Äôs stellar performance in Girls Singles Under 9 to Divyansh Rawat‚Äôs triumph in Boys Singles Under 17, the young talents left no shuttle unturned in their quest for victory.The results from the Delhi leg not only showcased the raw talent but also highlighted the championship‚Äôs commitment to breaking barriers. The PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship is not just about records; it‚Äôs about fostering a culture of healthy living, determination, and resilience among the future champions of the sport.In the words of Satwiksairaj Rankireddy, the championship serves as an invaluable platform.---------------------------------------------------------------As we celebrate the successful culmination of the 7th edition of PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship , we take pride in surpassing our own world record for highest participation and for being recognized by World Record Certification Agency. Beyond the records, JBC represents a significant milestone in our mission to lay the groundwork for India‚Äô s glory and success on the international badminton stage by creating a pan-India badminton ecosystem that nurtures champions at the grassroots levelThis year has been especially remarkable for PNB MetLife JBC as we joined hands with world champions Chirag Shetty and Satwiksairaj Rankireddy as JBC Mentors for the young talents associated with this tournament. They have played a pivotal role in inspiring young shuttlers to dream big and elevate their game and skills. We are eager for the next edition to unfold in our journey of unveiling the latent badminton potential across our nation and preparing them for global excellenceIt‚Äôs inspiring to witness the boundless talent and enthusiasm within our young athletes. My journey as JBC mentor has been incredibly fulfilling, as I got the opportunity to guide these budding champions and witness the journey of these young badminton stars. This championship is more than a competition; it is a platform that nurtures dreams, ignites aspirations, and, I believe, it is laying the foundation for future gold medalists in the makingTournaments like these serve as an invaluable platform for nurturing and harnessing the potential of our country‚Äôs young badminton stars. Witnessing the enthusiasm, passion, and skill displayed by these emerging shuttlers reinforces the belief that our country has an immense reservoir of talent. My association as a JBC mentor has been a source of immense pride, particularly given the role that the championship is playing in creating an incredible platform that is serving as a powerful catalyst, empowering young players and bolstering their confidence to become future champions
Article Summary: The 7th pnb metlife junior badminton championship shattered records with over 8,200 young talent nationwide. The grand finale unfolded at the indira gandhi indoor stadium in new delhi, where the air was thick with competition, camaraderie, and the unmistakable passion for badminton.
